mapper.insert: insert into cs_photo (user_id, photo_cg, category, photo_title, photo_content, photo_file, created_date, updated_date, photo_view_count) values (#{user_id}, #{photo_cg}, #{category}, #{photo_title}, #{photo_content}, #{photo_file}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{photo_view_count})
mapper.update: update cs_photo set photo_cg = #{photo_cg}, category = #{category}, photo_title = #{photo_title}, photo_content = #{photo_content}, photo_file = #{photo_file}, updated_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where photo_id = #{photo_id} and user_id = #{user_id}
